content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared plus 2"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math>. The function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is the result of a transformation of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> and is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared over 4 plus 2"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math>. Which of the following describes the transformation of the graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> whose image is the graph of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> ?

choices.label: ​A vertical dilation by a factor of <math alttext="1 fourth"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>
​A horizontal dilation by a factor of <math alttext="1 half"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>
​A horizontal dilation by a factor of <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math>
​A horizontal dilation by a factor of <math alttext="4"><mn>4</mn></math>

content.answer: ​A horizontal dilation by a factor of <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math>
